00021 /**
00022  * @file   CopyNumberTableModel.cpp
00023  * @author Mybrid Spalding
00024  * @date   Tue Mar 18 09:02:01 PDT 2008
00025  * @brief  DEPRECATED DMET2 ONLY: Class for wrapping the DMET2 copy number report TSV file.
00026  */
00027 
00028 
00029 #include "translation/CopyNumberTableModel.h"
00030 //
00031 #include <sstream>
00032 
00033 using namespace affx;
00034 using namespace std;
00035 
00036 const std::string DMET2_COPY_NUMBER_GENES[] = { "CYP2D6" };
00037 
00038 const int NUM_DMET2_COPY_NUMBER_GENES = 1;
00039 
00040 const TittmColumnDefinition CNTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[] = {
00041 // experiment sample prediction notes
00042 // 16x6_NA18507_Rep_1 NA18507 1 CN > 0: that is, CN=1,2,3,...
00043   // column name,         empty?, column, valid regular expersion
00044   { std::string("experiment"), 0,     0,  std::string(".*"), NULL },
00045   { std::string("sample"),     0,     1,  std::string(".*"), NULL },
00046   { std::string("prediction"), 0,     2,  std::string("^-?[0-9]$"), NULL },
00047   { std::string("notes"),      0,     3,  std::string(".*"), NULL },
00048 };
00049 
00050 /*****************************************************************************/
00051 /**
00052  * isGeneCopyNumberSensitive
00053  * Synopsis:
00054  *
00055  * DEPRECATED: DMET2 only
00056  *
00057  * HACK: This should be fixed. We currently check a hard coded C list
00058  * of gene names to see if they are copy number sensitive. This should
00059  * changed to come from some input file.
00060  *
00061  * @param gene - the gene name to check
00062  *
00063  * @return true - if copy number data applies to this gene.
00064  */
00065 /*****************************************************************************/
00066 bool isGeneCopyNumberSensitive(std::string gene)
00067 {
00068 
00069 
00070   for (int i = 0; i < NUM_DMET2_COPY_NUMBER_GENES; i++) {
00071     if (gene == DMET2_COPY_NUMBER_GENES[i]) {
00072       return true;
00073     }
00074   }
00075 
00076   return false;
00077 
00078 }
00079 // end isGeneCopyNumberSensitive
00080 /*****************************************************************************/
00081 /*****************************************************************************/
00082 /**
00083  * CopyNumberTableModel::CopyNumberTableModel
00084  * Synopsis:
00085  *
00086  * DEPRECATED: DMET2 only
00087  *
00088  * This is the TransferObject to the TsvFile DataAccessObject design
00089  * pattern. There is only ever one of these in existence, i.e. this
00090  * is a single instance class.
00091  *
00092  * copy number file -> copy number table model
00093  *
00094  *
00095  * Main constructor to read the copy number report file and stash the data
00096  * into the model.
00097  *
00098  * @param rte - Single instance RunTimeEnvironment
00099  * @param cntmFileName - the input file to read.
00100  */
00101 /*****************************************************************************/
00102 CopyNumberTableModel::CopyNumberTableModel(const RunTimeEnvironment &rte,
00103     const std::string & cntmFileName) :
00104     TranslationInputTsvTableModel(rte, cntmFileName, CNTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS,
00105                                   (sizeof(CNTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS) / sizeof(CNTM_COLUMN_DEFINITIONS[0])), false)
00106 {
00107 
00108 
00109   for (int i = 0; i < m_rows.size(); i++) {
00110 
00111     if (m_rows[i][PREDICTION_INDEX] == "0") {
00112 
00113       std::string call;
00114       pcrecpp::StringPiece notesConsume(m_rows[i][NOTES_INDEX]);
00115 
00116       if (pcrecpp::RE("(\\S+\\/\\S+)").FindAndConsume(&notesConsume, &call)) {
00117         m_experimentCopyNumberCall[m_rows[i][EXPERIMENT_INDEX]] = call;
00118       }
00119     }
00120   }
00121 
00122 }
00123 // end CopyNumberTableModel::CopyNumberTableModel
